oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Military Budget Swells, Consumer Dollar Shrinks"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military, Economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bombs showing the amount of money in the military's budget and pieces of dollar bills representing the amount of money consumers have at the same time.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
